sentence.Network_en: He followed irresolutely for a little distance, half a pace behind her.
sentence.Network_cn: 他犹豫地跟了短短的一段距离, 落在她身后半步路.

sentence.Network_en: She arose and stood irresolutely at the foot of the stairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 她起身来到楼梯脚下,犹豫不定地站在那里.

sentence.Network_en: " Are you sure? " he asked, irresolutely.
sentence.Network_cn: 他惘然问道: “ 你拿得稳 么 ?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I3) ... irresolute 犹豫不决的 irresolutely 优柔寡断地 irresolution 优柔寡断.
the spy irresolutely asked., 密探迟疑不决地问.

list.abs: A lack of certainty that often leads to irresolution ., 疑惑缺少肯定而导致犹豫不决.
the spy irresolutely asked., 密探迟疑不决地问.
